column2: BRIEF-Pzena Investment Management Announces Assets Under Management As Of April 30 May 7 (Reuters) - Pzena Investment Management Inc: * PZENA INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT, INC. ANNOUNCES APRIL 30, 2018 ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT * PZENA INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT INC - TOTAL AUM AS OF APRIL 30, 2018 OF $38.9 BILLION VERSUS $37.7 BILLION AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Pzena Investment Management Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.20 April 19 (Reuters) - Pzena Investment Management Inc : * PZENA INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT, INC. REPORTS RESULTS FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2018 * PZENA INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT - INCREASE OF $30 MILLION IN AMOUNT AUTHORIZED UNDER CURRENT PROGRAM TO REPURCHASE OUTSTANDING CLASS A STOCK, CLASS B UNITS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
